rows.label: qev041306_MSG0001
rows.name:
That food was delicious! And now that Pirapira full,
back to buying packs of Miralife Cards![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041306_MSG0002
rows.name: Nnh... At this rate, Pirapira pass out from hunger...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041306_MSG0003
rows.name:
This call for desperate measure... If friend can bring
two meteo eaters and five coaletri...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041306_MSG0004
rows.name:
Pirapira willing to take them, plus petramand or
cinicula card, in exchange for rare silver mortifole card![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041306_MSG0005
rows.name:
...What? Friend does not have them?
Then no trading for friend![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041306_MSG0009
rows.name:
Thank you, friend. Pirapira spend too much money on
Miralife Cards and run out of food money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041306_MSG0010
rows.name:
Pirapira be much more careful from now on.
Now here is silver mortifole card for friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev041306_MSG0011
rows.name:
Not even for card that rare? Hnnngh...
Tummy of Pirapira about to cave in on itself...[ST:wait ]
